sendMessageToNode

public Response sendMessageToNode(Message message,
                                  java.lang.String node,
                                  int timeout)
                           throws ClusterException
Send the message to the specified node.

Parameters:
message - The message to send.
node - The node of the form machineName-jvmNum to send the message to.
timeout - Timeout for waiting for a response.
Returns:
the response from the node or null.
Throws:
ClusterException - to identify problems.

sendMessageToNodes

public Response[] sendMessageToNodes(Message message,
                                     java.lang.String groupName,
                                     int timeout,
                                     boolean requireAllResponses)
                              throws ClusterException
Send the message to the specified nodes.

Parameters:
message - The message to send.
groupName - The nodes to send the message to identified by group name in the cluster definition. Note that level ClusterDefinition.ALL_NODES_GROUP indicates all nodes. Null indicates the current node, but null will be returned as this is not intended to send a message to self.
timeout - Timeout for waiting for a response.
Returns:
the response from the nodes or null.
Throws:
ClusterException - to identify problems.

sendMessageToNodes

public Response[] sendMessageToNodes(Message message,
                                     java.lang.String[] nodeNames,
                                     int timeout,
                                     boolean requireAllResponses)
                              throws ClusterException
Send the message to the specified nodes.

Parameters:
message - The message to send.
nodeNames - The nodes to send the message to identified by group name in the cluster definition. Note that level ClusterDefinition.ALL_NODES_GROUP indicates all nodes. Null indicates the current node, but null will be returned as this is not intended to send a message to self.
timeout - Timeout for waiting for a response.
Returns:
the response from the nodes or null.
Throws:
ClusterException - to identify problems.

sendJobCommand

public Response[] sendJobCommand(JobCommandMessage message,
                                 int timeout)
                          throws ClusterException
Send the given job command to all nodes working on the job.

Note that the job is identified by its local id on one node in order to get the global id and send the command to all job nodes.

Throws:
ClusterException

getGlobalJobId

protected GlobalJobId getGlobalJobId(java.lang.String oneNodeName,
                                     int localJobId,
                                     int timeout)
                              throws ClusterException

Throws:
ClusterException

                                 GlobalJobId globalJobId,
                                 int timeout)
